divs: Sighting Detailswent to bed observed out window single bright light decend from up in sky straight down to earth . did not see landing. took about one second.thought maybe a shooting star . but no trail and seem to start from fixed position in sky.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Wixom
There were no other sightings in Wixom on or around March 18th 2013
Summary: light decend straighy down from sky to earth
